snippet: Private equity can be a valuable source of capital and expertise for small-business owners, but owners should know what they — and the investors — want from the deal.
abstract: Private equity can be a valuable source of capital and expertise for small-business owners, but owners should know what they--and the investors--want from the deal; overview of things to consider by owners before taking the money.
lead_paragraph: Private equity can be a valuable source of capital and expertise for small-business owners, but owners should know what they — and the investors — want from the deal.

headline.seo: What Small-Business Owners Should Know About Private Equity
headline.main: Owners Should Know What They’re Getting With Private Equity
headline.print_headline: Owners Should Know What They’re Getting With Private Equity
